content: We're also pleased with the intercompany services sold between all of our 105 offices, obtaining over $37 million in contracted sales business across the platform for 2022. Hey, good afternoon, guys. Hey, good afternoon, guys. The budget for â23 shows in those two sectors that are the real estate interest rate, depending on the portfolio of businesses, they're showing roughly a 14% degradation from the budget last year. The L3HARRIS is mostly analytic, mostly software and I'm going to, you'll notice in my concluding comments, I'll mention that we did get the 16 patents that they're doing and really some well-known software that we will be using to support not only the existing clients, but we hope to present them to some of the clients that we're doing in our traditional geospatial services. Some that we've submitted term sheets for, some are in due diligence, but I would look, we think one in specific supports are really growing utility service businesses, but most of the acquisitions will not be a platform based, but mostly acquisitions that will support our existing platform. But we want to support this organic growth, not just in the M&A activity, but initiatives that we've had for this year designed to really help our operations enter new markets, provide new services, or strengthen maybe some of the existing platforms they have.
